LanguageData.VQE_InhibitorResearchLab.questDescriptio:
questDescription(askerIsNull==True)->Garbled through the static, it seems some ancient network has mistaken your radio for that of an ancient reconnaissance worker after detecting your travels through an automated satellite.

The message harshly refers to you as E352, and tasks you with scouting another supersoldier laboratory. Though this broadcast seems to have been running from some time now, it warns of a major uprising event within the lab. Supersoldiers had risen out of containment, and now roam the facility locked inside. The reconnaissance task states that the site was evacuated, yet the uprising was never contained and it is likely some may have escaped.

The broadcast also contains schematics of the location including your real objective. A device called the mutagen inhibitor core. Though just a prototype prior to its sudden abandonment, it is built to suppress unstable genetic mutations. It is likely that other valuable equipment remains here as well. offering transparent probabilities on genetic experiments. Our objective will be to locate the uplink and uninstall it for use in our own laboratory.
